thread.title: A Swim Team "Swam" In The Snow In Nothing But Speedos After Their Meet Was Cancelled - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: A Swim Team "Swam" In The Snow In Nothing But Speedos After Their Meet Was Cancelled - BuzzFeed News

author: Julie Gerstein
title: A Swim Team "Swam" In The Snow In Nothing But Speedos After Their Meet Was Cancelled - BuzzFeed News
text:
“We woke up and saw the snow and we were saying, ‘If we don’t end up swimming today, we’re making snow angels in Speedos,’” he told BuzzFeed News. ID: 10284978 5. As part of their “race,” they each completed a real swim relay leg. Here’s sophomore Colt Williamson doing the breaststroke. View this image ›
Instagram: @gtswimdive ID: 10284646 6. And sophomore Brad Oberg doing a VERY COLD butterfly stroke. View this image ›
Instagram: @gtswimdive ID: 10284989 7. According to Matt Casillas, who ran the lead leg of the snowy race, most of the team hasn’t even had much exposure to snow prior to the blizzard. View this image ›
Facebook: matthew.casillas.56 “We’re from all over. It’s a pretty mixed group,” he said.
ID: 10285029 8. So would Pastel, recommend others try swimming in the snow, too? “If you want to not feel your feet or hands for a half hour, then by all means, go ahead,” he said. View this image ›
Facebook: aidan.pastel No thanks, we’ll pass.
ID: 10284981 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
Vape dad. Contact Julie Gerstein at julie.gerstein@buzzfeed.com .
